keyword: calories in chick fil a large fries
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A Large Fries

quick_answer.text: A large serving of Chick-fil-A waffle fries has 520 calories, 60g carbs, and 27g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant or packaged info.

tweaks.label: Choose medium size instead of large
Add one packet of Chick-fil-A ketchup
Request no salt (reduces sodium but calories similar)

faqs.q: How many calories in Chick-fil-A large fries?
faqs.a: 520 calories per large serving of waffle potato fries.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Chick-fil-A large fries?
faqs.a: About 60g total carbs, including 6g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a large Chick-fil-A fries?
faqs.a: 27g total fat, with 4.5g saturated fat and 0g trans fat.

faqs.q: Are Chick-fil-A large fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 240mg sodium per serving; opt for no salt to reduce.
